name: TOT COMICS DOOM
description: STORY: It was a peaceful day on the base, you were sitting in the lounge watching T.V, when all of a sudden a bunch of monsters appeared and started killing and breaking everything. So you grab your trusty pistol and run out the door. "It's time to kick ass and chew bub-" you begin to say, but your words are cut short as you fall into the sewer. Now standing in ankle deep slime your journey begins...
